txt.en: 'I have noticed some very evil-looking dragonets during my travels throughout the Silvertine Lodes, but with no sense of where their hive could be until I came here. I believe they have made their home in this old city here.\n\n'If you slay them at their own hive, I believe we will be cutting off the entire population of the menaces throughout the entirety of the Silvertines. Will you help, [placeholder]?'

'I am deeply indebted to you! This will make a great difference, I think, for dwarves all over the Silvertine Lodes. You have my thanks, [placeholder].\n\n'Has anyone ever told you how incredibly useful you seem to be?'
'I cannot abide those foul, disease-ridden dragonets in this ancient city!'
Dragonets of the Old Silvertine City
The sinister dragonets of the Silvertine Lodes have picked off several dwarves running supplies between the dwarf-camps in the Silvertine Lodes and Water-works.
Kill dragonets in the Old Silvertine City ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Diseased dragonets can be found in the Old Silvertine City in the southern Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should slay many of the diseased dragonets.
Inform Öndótt that the dragonet population has been lessened
Öndótt stands at the top of the stairwell in the Old Silvertine City.\n\nYou should return to Öndótt.
